website_summaries.verdict: The Hisense 50H8C is an under-$500 50-inch 4K television that offers excellent color accuracy, but is held back by a sluggish interface.
cons: Smart TV features are occasionally choppy and slow
Only two inconveniently placed HDMI 2.0 ports

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, turn off Dynamic Backlight
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. I would recommend turning off the 'Dynamic Backlight' as it annoyingly dims the screen using whatever settings that I suppose are meant to be 'enhancing' but are just aweful. It is under All in settings menu, Picture, then Backlight. I measured the feet of the TV and at their furthest point they are 78 cm wide. The whole TV fits perfectly on my 1m wide table with no overhang.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value TV. Does all you need.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV for the money. Previously had a 5000 series Samsung, then an 8000 Series, both of which failed after a few years use with backlight inverter problems. This is easily as good as the older 8000 Series Samsung that it replaced. Picture quality is excellent, it even does a reasonable job at upscaling SD. Sound quality is also good. Not tinny like some of the no name brands, but don't expect to feel the bass in your chest either. Love the smart features, we make regular use of the Amazon and Netflix apps. So much more convenient that booting up the Playstation or XBox. I would definitely choose this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Weech

customer_reviews.title: Good tv but lost its picture just under 3 years
customer_reviews.text: This was a good TV, bought in Nov 16, but in July 19 the screen went black but the sound continued to work, the cost to repair is too great, so I ordered a new TV, TV are not built to last anymore
customer_reviews.author: Leetus

customer_reviews.title: A great 4K Smart TV with excellent picture.It happens to be very well priced but price is not the reason for this review.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV. Good value, many options including ARC HDMI and extensive sound and picture adjustment. The picture settings options are very considerate and adjustable for what you want (in bright light, evening light, dark room etc.). Network feature works great with Netflix, YouTube etc. Visually, the profile is classy (slim surround, small footprint). And, the value for money is amazing. Therefore, I now have two!! How cool is that?
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: overall I'm delighted with it for the price I don't think you'd ...
customer_reviews.text: Had never heard of hisense much until recently and took a plunge on buying this tv, overall I'm delighted with it for the price I don't think you'd do better. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I couldn't download some catch up apps from standard enough channels
customer_reviews.author: Ian P.

customer_reviews.title: DESIGNED TO BREAK
customer_reviews.text: A short overview, this is a budget 4K tv me and my sister both bought two at seperate times. Mine broke just after a year and my sisters broke after 2 years. For no apparent reasons. I've had no luck contenting hisense. And repairing a tv is isn't my specialty. From now on I will be avoiding all hisense products. This kind of reliabilty is absolutely atrocious. Would avoid and would recommend others to not buy from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: al habibi

customer_reviews.title: No longevity
customer_reviews.text: We love this tv very easy to set up and use great picture. However, although it is only guaranteed for 2 years I would expect a tv of this supposed quality to last at least 5 years. We have had the tv 2 years and 9 months and the picture has gone so very disappointed and that us why it has only got 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Procies

customer_reviews.title: the picture is superb the sound is pretty good for a led TV and out shines the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this TV for a 8 months now and cannot fault it, the picture is superb the sound is pretty good for a led TV and out shines the Samsung 55" we got last year. Do not use for freeview so cannot comment on the epg menu slowness, but the TV gets updates very frequently Hooked up to an amazon tv box and stream all viewing I got this for £330 in the amazon warehouse said damaged box which it did have a small tear but the TV was new and in pristine condition, so a great Price and a great TV, Family have been so impressed by the picture quality they have purchased the 50" model
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it !! Love it |!! Love it!!. Brilliant Amazon delivery, product packing superb, Set up in less than 5 minutes. Fabulous picture and sound totally adequate considering all the hype about poor sound with modern TV's. If you're thinking of buying this product then stop thinking and get your hand in your pocket, it's a must and an excellent buy for the relatively low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied from Shropshire

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: After looking at TVs for weeks, trying to get the best deal / value for money. I decided not to go for a big brand LG or Samsung and instead, trust the reviews and go for the 49" Hisense. Great decision, tv is great, no problems whatsoever. Sound is loud, colour and clarity are great the only thing to say is the blacks are not as good as they could be when watching tv (gaming seems to be fine) but some playing around with the setting may sort this out. All in all though your getting the same as the £700+ Big brand TVs for half the cost. 2 hdmis 3 x 2k 2 hdmis normal 2 x 1080p
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Starts to freeze up after few months
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning the TV was working fine and was good but after a few months it would freeze up and no matter what I tried it would not work, tried all the updates and advice from Hisense but nothing worked and the only way it could be turned off was from main plug socket, this in the long run is not safe practice. it must be a manufacturing fault as it was the second Hisense TV that it happened to, both were same model.
customer_reviews.author: Maisie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this TV for quite a while now and its still perfect quality and had no issues at all. 4k looks stunning on it when using Netflix and for the price 50" is a steal. I'd recommend this over any other TV in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Turner

customer_reviews.title: Cheap rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Tv lasted about 18 months before the display packed up and the remote never worked properly would never buy hisense again!
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this!
customer_reviews.text: AVOID! The TV backlight only lasts for 2 and a half years. Amazon will tell you it's not there problem to fix it, manufacturer warranty is only 2 years and will not repair it. Waste of money! The tv belongs in a skip.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly to this day, 2 years later
customer_reviews.text: The smart features might be a bit slow to boot up but it reaches 4k fine. When extreme gaming the screen may lag a bit , but no dead pixels or anything. Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Lovely for the money & lovely picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Lovely for the money & lovely picture quality when adjust the settings to get the best out of the TV. Did get this TV to replace my Panasonic TX-40DX700B which had a dead pixel. Over this tv it does in all honesty have a much lower picture quality than the Panasonic, but is also have the price so to be expected. In summary very good value for money & would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tv
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing tv, not different from all those high well known brands, amazing resolution for gaming and movies, watching Netflix is an absolute joy on this.
customer_reviews.author: Uchiha

customer_reviews.title: You Won't Go Wrong With Hisense
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tv and amazing value. I bought a Hisense phone and was impressed, so decided to go for the TV and glad I did. Beautiful picture, you can see every last detail. Grest value for money
customer_reviews.author: Juney

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for the money
customer_reviews.text: Just delighted with this. Set up easy, screen is lovely, sound is good. Price excellent. Doesnt quite match higher end products as black screen a bit blue. Is 4k but I have a virgin tivo box and pretty sure it can only show up to 1076hd so cant really watch anything in 4k yet.
customer_reviews.author: Slickman/hitman

customer_reviews.title: gaming and netflix TV!!!
customer_reviews.text: great TV!! real 4K and games (xbox one) and Netflix look crazy good on it, best thing I've brought this year.
customer_reviews.author: B Slade

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 4K TV.
customer_reviews.text: At Amazon's lowest price this is an AMAZING purchase, I'm waiting on the 65" version to reach that magic discount and will grab it!
customer_reviews.author: W. Fitzsimons

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the TV table is long enough to take the width of the feet.
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with it at the price. No problems with the TVs or the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Mjmaddison

customer_reviews.title: Hisense tv
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the tv the picture quality is very good and the price was very competitive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture quality. I use it as a computer monitor and it's good choice I've made. Input lag in gaming mode is low enough to let me play competitive games.
customer_reviews.author: Margus H.

customer_reviews.title: Once done very happy.
customer_reviews.text: A little time consuming in getting the settings to our taste. Once done very happy.
customer_reviews.author: MR EDDIE HUTCHINS

customer_reviews.title: 4K in your home ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a goood tv ... don't listen to those people that gave one star ... I love it .. I use it as as monitor and I love it ... everything is good but the only problem is it dosent have Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Sina

customer_reviews.title: Great value set
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little tweaking with settings but once right picture is fantastic, sound is great too, no need for soundbar. Looks good. Menus are basic but functional, and Plex built in. Would not hesitate to recommend
customer_reviews.author: marky175

customer_reviews.title: Poor product poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived plugged it in screen is black only audio after speaking to hisense been told it has a faulty led backlight and it's Amazon's responsibility to replace it after 2 Artemis it was eventually collected and had to figure to get a refund from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Qtpie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for great price. Arrived 1 month earlier than I was expecting. Works perfectly with Apple TV remote (switch on/off). Sound is more then enough. Screen is perfect. 55'' size 4K.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tv
customer_reviews.text: Very good tv and amazing for value. You get phenominal clarity and very good built in speakers that are suprisingly very loud and clear. The remote come with a built in netflix button for convenience. Would definantly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: So far the TV is excellent, great internet and HD and plenty of HDMI / USB connectors. Also looks well made and stylish, amazing for this price level!
customer_reviews.author: John Queripel

customer_reviews.title: This has been a good purchase viewing angles are not perfect but compensated by ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good purchase viewing angles are not perfect but compensated by fitting bracket with swivel and tilt so sorted and price was spot on for me/
customer_reviews.author: Dboy forre

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, great sound.... Dreadful software
customer_reviews.text: Software is sooooo bad. Frustratingly slow to respond to the remote, Updates are scarce, and my experience with Hisense customer service has been poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized tv
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized tv, clear picture, playback channels only have BBC playback, no itv ch4 or 5. will have to find out how to download them. will have get a kid to show me.c.robins
customer_reviews.author: C. Robins

customer_reviews.title: Super TV bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Super high definition TV at a very realistic price. It was easy to install and ultra easy to operate.. One handset now does nearly everything.
customer_reviews.author: Paper Painter

customer_reviews.title: so I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Superb 4K picture, HDMI 2.0 means a really fast display from games consoles (4K) and my PC, so I highly recommend this TV
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great 4k TV
customer_reviews.text: Great 4k TV, little limited with smart apps so consider an android box or a fire 4k streamer. Fools rush in should have waited for black Friday where I imagine this will be significantly discounted.
customer_reviews.author: G A Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it. everything works just fine so I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: koo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: been using it for 1 week and I'm very pleased, the best tv for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and user friendly. It has good sound profiles to choose based on your setting either theater or music. It's very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Super telly for the money
customer_reviews.text: Super telly for the money, love the input options, internet TV and nice picture. Definitely worth mounting on the wall as its VERY large

customer_reviews.title: Great TV. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv. Had a bit of trouble with courier but Amozon was brilliant in resolving problem

customer_reviews.title: Remote control not for Britain
customer_reviews.text: Once you find out how to work it? The remote control could be better.

customer_reviews.title: ... to for a short while but it is very good value for
customer_reviews.text: Only had this to for a short while but it is very good value for money

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise all great.
customer_reviews.text: I just wish legs came from the middle. I had to buy a wider tv set for a 43" tv! Otherwise all great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got the m3000 today the picture is very good it was worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful, but didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: 4 months after warranty had run out the screen failed an was unrepairable which was a shame because I liked the tv

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with picture quality, sound is not as bad as some reviews would have you believe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good value, have to change settings to custom to get the most out of it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is superb value for money. Built in Netflix and YouTube is just the start. The 4K picture is fantastic and there are no shortage of ports. Definitely recommended. Guessing it's so cheap because HiSense isn't an established brand name in this country yet.
customer_reviews.author: LCJohnson79

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant TV no problems plenty of ports, worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: chorley20

customer_reviews.title: When you get your box check for a remote! ...
customer_reviews.text: When you get your box check for a remote!!! I think this is an Amazon issue also, taking items back and not checking the box goods.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really fantastic TV. Only negative is blacks arent great on it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I got this before Christmas at a great price. For the money this is a brilliant ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this before Christmas at a great price. For the money this is a brilliant tv all I could have asked for and more. One thing you need to do though is turn off the dynamic contrast control this improved the viewing experience no end.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD MACLELLAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: TV is smarter than me. Still finding new features after a month of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this TV. Easy to set up and the picture and sound are great.

customer_reviews.title: We love this TV
customer_reviews.text: An absolute bargain. We love this TV, and it is really simple to set up.

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Great TV ,it punches well above its weight in both sound and picture quality.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for the price and delivery was super quick and convenient

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only missing part is that the cast from macbook to the TV is not possible.

customer_reviews.title: Can't ask for much more
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. I'm no expert on 4k TV's but could not ask for anything more - great picture, good for gaming (has HDR), inbuilt 4k apps. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Good picrure quality, I’m happy with the size, delivery was on time and in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money!!!! Delivered in 3 days, easy to set up, I went off the reviews before purchasing this TV, would highly recommend getting this TV if you are looking for a large TV for a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Not set for UK
customer_reviews.text: Came with European power lead not UK. Software and SMART setup prioritise German bias!!

customer_reviews.text: This TV didn't last more then a year after buying it complete waste of money

customer_reviews.text: Great tv for price, have it few weeks and I'm love it

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tv for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tv. Love it! Great quality and really a bargain!

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Good picture, good sound. Takes time getting to use it. A dreadful user manual does not help - it is one page with hardly anything in it! Good value for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: brilliant tv for the price so well worth the money and might even buy another.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A whole lot of TV for the price you pay. Thumbs Up!!!

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with this TV
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this TV. I was a little nervous purchasing it having not heard of the brand, but I'm so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive television
customer_reviews.text: very good TV, good value, 2 YEAR warranty is a bonus,,,,
customer_reviews.author: george greig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great television perfect quality not as good as Samsung but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Jack Irwin

customer_reviews.title: good buy, i'll keep it.
customer_reviews.text: One year in with no issues so far, HDR update applied ok and a recent update for freeviewhd too, has built in SAT HD/4K too tested on sat channels all play and look really nice too in the 4K promo video shown, just needs more free channels really. 4K Youtube in 60fps looks smooth as silk in 30fps etc can look choppy. Not all 4K videos online are created equal i've found. games like Killer Instinct [pc] look fantastic too
customer_reviews.author: Pen name

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Slim design allows me to stand this over my mantelpiece. Very happy with this purchase. Image quality great. Fast response with youtube/Netflix. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Posh Pennies

customer_reviews.title: Top quality at good price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this television is absolutely superb, has the Amazon Instant Video app built in so if you have a prime account there is some limited 4K content available for you to watch, but the watching of HD looks great and smooth on this, is also working perfectly with FIFA.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good tv and it does have HDR and it will work on the PS4 and obviously the PS4 PRO. If you have a PSVR box set up with your PS4. HDR will not work as the PS4 has to be plugged directly into the TV for it to work. Stopped working after a month and trying to get it fixed
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: what a fantastic tv for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a 4k tv for a while now but prices were way too unbelievably high and then i came across this one Great tv it arrived early and picture is absolutely stunning wouldn't say its proper 4k its up scaled but there's not much of a difference after downloading the hdr on to it, it has really bad lag when first turned on but give it a half a day and your fine , great tv for the price very happy customer 👍
customer_reviews.author: JagerMaster

customer_reviews.title: happy as larry
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, had been looking for a tv for a while before I found this, was sceptical about the brand to begin with until I read online how popular in other countries and they sponsored the football so I gave it a try. could not get better value for money. you do need to go into the settings to get the most from the sound and picture but menus are simple. had this a while now before I posted the review to see how it held up. Plus I saved enough money buying this to get a few other things. very happy
customer_reviews.author: Scott Loudon

customer_reviews.title: Trusted the reviews,  and glad i did,  great telly!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed so far, beautiful display. Took a punt on the 55" based on the reviews, really glad i did. Got a great TV for £200 to £300 quid cheaper than an equivalent well known make like Samsung
customer_reviews.author: Tam the Bam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing piece of tv :)
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just wow. Picture quality is excellent, from any angle as well. It's menus are fast and the dound is quite good too. I am still impressed after a month of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K

customer_reviews.title: This TV is excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: This TV is excellent value for money, I just have two criticisms - 1. Blacks are a bit washed out. 2. The sound is very boomy. I've tried adjusting the sound settings to no avail. Opted for a bluetooth headset in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent delivery service and tv for price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent delivery service and tv for price, picture is stunning , is a smart TV , delighted with it , set it up in no time to ps4 etc.
customer_reviews.author: Eliz

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the money, my other TV is a Sony & although the build quality is superior it's not worth over twice what I paid for the Hisense.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: 4k quality and 1080 prices
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is an excellent tv. The only real drawbacks are it doesn't have amazing viewing angles and you cannot sideload apps onto it. The built in app store is poor and holds nothing of interest so sideloading would have been nice. Installation was nice and easy and dispute its size it was easy to move around and not very heavy
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The remote control stop working every now and than
customer_reviews.text: After the First month I've to say that the quality was pretty good but now, everytime I watch it, happen that the remote control stop working and I have to switch off and than on again the Tv. I'm pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great but flawed
customer_reviews.text: The Price for the Picture quality is great and it would be perfect but for some unknown reason I have no option at all to disable "Ultra Motion Smoothing" I've seen that other people have had the option with HISENSE to disable the so called "Soap Opera effect" I'm upgraded to the latest software, HDR is great but no smoothing options and Aspect ratio is Greyed out?
customer_reviews.author: badabing

customer_reviews.title: Far better than the mainstream brands
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, not having heard of this brand before. After doing some research I decided to take the plunge (after returning a Sony 32"). 1 month later and I have not regretted my decision. The TV is excellent - great smart features, excellent picture and sound, and fantastic value for money. I'm very happy with this purchase and would certainly buy Hisense again over any of the mainstream brands (I've owned Samsung and Sony TV's in the past. They have worked fine but been far dearer to buy than these Hisense models).
customer_reviews.author: Francis Hall

customer_reviews.title: ... a 4k 43 inch and the quality is very good. As the saying goes best bang per buck ...
customer_reviews.text: 299 for a 4k 43 inch and the quality is very good. As the saying goes best bang per buck TV. For people with a brandaphobia you will pay close to 500 for a TV of this quality.
customer_reviews.author: IAN HUGHES

customer_reviews.title: A great product. It also has a satellite tuner in ...
customer_reviews.text: A great product. It also has a satellite tuner in it, though the channel numbers seem different from a dedicated satellite box I have. The fact that it had this satellite tuner in it was not apparent from the advertising literature when I bought it - that was a bonus. Not often I buy a product that is better than advertised!! Quite a lot less than some other products for the same thing so excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I've only had it a few weeks though but so far I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the picture quality for the price. I've only had it a few weeks though but so far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Good settings menu and easy to navigate. Brilliant picture, Netflix built in with accessible 4 x HDMI which connects my Freesat+, Xbox, Amazon Prime and laptop, you can name every connection to suit and one button to get to selection menu.
customer_reviews.author: Mikejc

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this for a few months and can't speak too highly of it. The picture quality is exceptional, it's got enough hdmi connections to satisfy us geeks, the screen size is not excessive even for my lounge. Can't recommend it enough. Don't worry because you've never heard of them before, value for money'
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this Brand!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered within 24 hours. Huge TV, seems much bigger than my 48" LG. Quality is amazing, talk about value for money, I cannot rate it highly enough. I have owned all major labels, Sony, Samsung, LG etc. this compares with the best of them. I would recommend this Brand to anyone, I am a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The is really good for the price ultra hd on amazon prime an ...
customer_reviews.text: The is really good for the price ultra hd on amazon prime an netflix are brilliant the only issue I've got with it is the hdr it will not work with anything tried updating the firmware even had hisense send me the firmware on a usb stick an still no joy
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Hisense 49" Smart 4K ultra tv
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! One very happy son, does as described and more 😊👌

customer_reviews.title: almost great :-(
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent television with a great HD capacity - the only reason I do not give it a full 5 stars is the difficulty in putting the vast number of freeview channels available in the UK into any reasonable order to make it easier to access the programmes I frequently watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. E. Downs

customer_reviews.title: Good BUY
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy. the price is right and a very good picture. sound is better than average for TV speakers.

customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the TV but unable to link the sky remote. There's no 4 digit code available
customer_reviews.author: JosieC

feature_bullets: Ultra HD 4K: Packing four times the number of pixels into the same screen sizes as traditional 1080 p
Smart TV: Instantly stream from BBC iPlayer, Netflix and YouTube
Freeview HD: Get the preferable TV channels in high definition
Slim and powerful high quality sound bar with dual build in subwoofers
